content: i absolutely love designing shawls recently as i love using them myself also they are a great gift for someone you love this beautiful pattern is only using a few different stitches double_crochet front and back post double_crochet and puff stitches to create a beautifully textured look this pattern is available for ***free on my blog*** or you can dowload an ad free pdf version from my ravelry store for a small fee **difficulty ** advanced beginner / intermediate **us terms** used throughout **written pattern only with no chart** i hope you ll love it as much as i loved creating it **happy crocheting ** ***krisztina***
